Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Relates to creating the Great Lakes and state waters bill of rights
Summary: Creates a Great Lakes and state waters bill of rights that declares the right of the Great Lakes and state waters to exist, flourish and naturally evolve.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to creating the Great Lakes and State Waters Bill of Rights
